name: Lemonade Day
description:
Mini Game Jam Submission 

Theme: Seaside

Made by A Krit's All You Need

On sunny beach day, people are gathering to enjoy the summertime. It is your job to serve them lemonade before they overcrowd you.

Control:

WASD or Arrow Key to Move

Spacebar button: Shoot

Goals:

Aim for the Hiscore!

Music:

Anywhere - @Ikson [Tropical House]

Cheer Sound
